Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Counter

  • public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
    Counter class that keeps track of a counter that can be reset. Both the starting point and the limit is to be defined by the user at creation of the object. The point of reset happens when count goes equal to or above the limit that was set.
